# predict.tattoo — Tattoos & Body Art Prediction Markets

> Real-time prediction markets for tattoos & body art. Bet on outcomes, see live odds, and win. Free to play with shared pools powered by Firebase.


predict.tattoo is a prediction market platform focused on tattoos & body art. Users can bet YES or NO on curated markets with real-time shared pools. Features live odds, countdown timers, trending markets, and social sharing. Part of the Predict Network — 18 niche prediction market sites.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Tattoos & Body Art prediction markets with live odds](https://predict.tattoo)
- [Markets — Active tattoos & body art prediction markets](https://predict.tattoo#markets)


## Keywords

prediction market, tattoos & body art, betting, odds, forecast, predict.tattoo
